channel.title: Adding links to another webpage on your webhost?
channel.description:
Alright, I am going to try my best to explain my problem. I recently used deathchaos9's tutorial on adding highscores.
Right now, to access the highscores, you must either: A)Type in the whole address into your address bar B)Have myself upload the highscores folder onto my webhost and have them manually select highscores.php to load the highscores.
In conclusion, I want a single click link (preferably that I can label) that would open up "ip/highscores/highscores.php" in the address bar that can be clicked on from my webhost page.
I know absolutely nothing about web development so help is extremely appreciated. Thanks.

item.title: Adding links to another webpage on your webhost?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

That’s what that code does. It should appear like this

Click here to view highscores

Oh and Thomas (I Vain I) wants you to add him on MSN
i.vain.i@hotmail.com

Read full topic
item.source: Adding links to another webpage on your webhost?

item.title: Adding links to another webpage on your webhost?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:2, topic:377982”]<a href="http://ip/highscores/highscores.php" target="_blank">Click here to view highscores</a>

Is that what you want?[/quote]

Yes, just a simple one-click link that would open up the highscores. How do I make it so that “Click here to view highscores” is the only thing that appears on the webhost, and I can simply click it?

Read full topic
